entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
